TextBlock.Text: PILEA: I've learned something very interesting about the hoppers' migratory patterns!
PILEA: They seem to all be coming and going from a specific location: the <color=orange>Red Seed</color>.
FOLI: What do you think is on the other side of it?
KEEK: I think I can assemble a probe we can send through it. It'll require reusing some materials from the mining project.
FOLI: Take whatever you need. If there's something that could save us from the spatial fluctuations there, investigating is top priority.
PILEA: No way to know for sure, but I'm very excited to find out!
